purpose: Continue countdown to Titanverse launch at The Pharmacy Show with looping animation showcasing TITAN to TITANVERSE transition, building anticipation and driving attendance.
core_message: In just 3 days, you can see Titanverse in action. The smartest consultation platform pharmacy has ever seen. Built for services. Built for the future.
summary: Looping animated video transitioning between TITAN and TITANVERSE branding, continuing countdown to Pharmacy Show launch and building anticipation.
